title: Would Riot rather have Bots than People playing ARAM?
body:
So once again an ARAM is done and dusted. Side that wins is once again the side with the less Bots, again, and again, and again...

Is this the future that Riot wants for us? Because it certainly the present and the Gut wrenching part is that Riot seem happy to play along and let it happen.

I have already been driven off the Rift because of the Toxic environment that abounds there, enabled by Riots belief that everyone has the right to be abused. Now it seems that ARAM is going downhill fast, not because people are toxic but because people are getting harder and harder to find and once again Riot seem unwilling to do anything about it.

replies.body:
I only play ARAM, and I see a single bot in a game every now and then.

Perhaps ARAM has some hidden ELO that prevents me from experiencing this?

have a look at at this https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/FHY85KIG-botting-in-sr-games-and-why-this-is-bad
and try some of the stuff he has posted if you want to help get rid of them like opening support tickets.
